settings.title: What is TROOV?
settings.body: TROOV is an all-natural, plant-based, ready-to-enjoy, pre-workout drink designed to help you find your true groove over and over again—without the crash.

settings.title: Why should I drink TROOV?
settings.body: We created TROOV for performance. It’s that simple. We use effective dosages of ingredients specifically chosen because they make a difference when it comes to efficiency, endurance, fatigue, and performance.

settings.title: What can I expect this to taste like?
settings.body: Troov features fully brewed green tea and fermented beets as our base with no sugar added. Along with other plant-based ingredients, our customers say we taste like a light-flavored earthy tea.

settings.title: My drink has turned more brown than red, is it still okay to drink?
settings.body: Yes, it is still fine to consume! When Troov is produced, it is a bright red color from the fermented beets. However, overtime that color turns slightly brown. This is due to the beet pigments which are unstable and sensitive to thermal processing. During the pasteurization process of Troov, the beetroot cells start to break down and the color gradually diminishes overtime. This does not effect the efficacy or taste of the drink, but it does effect the color.

settings.title: Why does the bottle have sediment at the bottom?
settings.body: Troov features 1590mg of maca root which is not water soluble. Since our product features zero artificial ingredients or binders, it's natural for there to be some separation. Give the bottle a good shake and make sure all the sediment at the bottom has been absorbed before consuming.

settings.title: Why is TROOV a better alternative to other energy beverages?
settings.body:
We're you, that’s why we created TROOV. We were tired of other pre-workouts pretending to be something other than what they are. That’s why we made a functional beverage that’s actually full of real ingredients as close to how they’re found in nature as possible. Real vegetables, ripe fruits, natural teas. We don’t use anything synthetic and we don’t pretend to not use anything synthetic because we wouldn’t want that, either.

We formulated TROOV with clinical dosages of beets, L-Citrulline, and caffeine. We didn’t add any sugar and, while we’re low calorie, we’re also an excellent source of amino acids (so you have the energy to keep going).

We’re proudly gluten, dairy, and soy-free; vegan, no sugar added, and preservative free.

settings.title: How can I contact TROOV for support?
settings.body: Submit our contact form here or email us at support@drinkTROOV.com

settings.title: What happens if I don’t like TROOV?
settings.body: We promise you’ll love it, but there’s a first time for everything and, if you aren’t completely satisfied, please contact us for a full refund.

settings.title: What is flow state?
settings.body: We define “flow” as effortless performance in the present moment. TROOV is our short cut to consistently getting there, time and time again.

settings.title: I got TROOV on my gym clothes. How do I remove the stain?
settings.body: Oops! It happens. Just spray it with a stain remover, let it soak for an hour, and rinse with cold water. Wash like normal.

settings.title: Do I need to refrigerate Troov?
settings.body: No, TROOV does not need to be refrigerated, but we highly recommend it because it tastes much better cold. Because we don’t use any synthetic  binders, things separate so be sure to shake well before drinking.

settings.title: GENERAL
How much caffeine is in TROOV?
settings.body: 125mg but because of our synergistic ingredients, you won’t feel a high and then a crash. This is consistent, sustained energy, released over time.

settings.title: Is TROOV made with peanuts or tree nuts?
settings.body: TROOV is completely nut-free, but it is made in a facility that does process nuts.

settings.title: When is the ideal time to consume TROOV?
settings.body: Over time, you’ll fine-tune what’s best for you, but we have found 30-45 minutes before your workout is ideal.

settings.title: How much is one serving of TROOV?
settings.body: 12oz or one bottle. We don’t like when it’s a weird 1.5 or 2.75 servings per bottle either.

settings.title: Is it okay to drink more than two TROOV energy drinks per day?
settings.body: It absolutely is up to the individual, but we recommend checking with your healthcare provider as tolerance and effectiveness may vary.

settings.title: Can you consume TROOV while pregnant or breastfeeding?
settings.body: Especially when pregnant or breastfeeding, we always recommend checking with your healthcare provider if you’re adding something new to your diet that you’re not certain about.

settings.title: Can diabetics drink TROOV?
settings.body: We want to make sure you’re as healthy as possible so we recommend checking with your healthcare provider to make sure everything looks good.

settings.title: Can children drink TROOV?
settings.body: Overall, TROOV is safe for children, but we recommend checking with your pediatrician to ensure there are no underlying health conditions or causes for concern.

settings.title: Where can I find the nutritional information?
settings.body: Right here.

settings.title: How many calories are in TROOV?
settings.body: 60 k/cal

settings.title: What is TROOV sweetened with?
settings.body: Lemon juice; natural strawberry, watermelon, cranberry, and guava flavors; 100% plant-derived stevia; other natural flavors.

settings.title: Is TROOV non-GMO?
settings.body: Absolutely

settings.title: Is TROOV Gluten-Free?
settings.body: No question, yes.

settings.title: Is TROOV Dairy-free?
settings.body: Completely.

settings.title: Is TROOV soy-free?
settings.body: Happily so.

settings.title: Is TROOV Vegan?
settings.body: You know it.

settings.title: PRODUCT / INGREDIENTS
What is nitric oxide and why do I care?
settings.body:
We love nitric oxide! It’s a naturally produced molecule in your body that’s incredibly important to so many aspects of your health and wellness. Most importantly (and if you only remember one thing), it has a huge impact on vasodilation. That means it relaxes the inner muscles of the blood vessels, making them wider, increasing circulation.

When we zoom out, we see that nitric oxide production is crucial to overall bodily health because it allows blood, nutrients, and oxygen to freely (and efficiently) travel through every part of your body.

When your body isn’t able to readily produce nitric oxide, we see a correlation to increased heart disease, diabetes, and erectile dysfunction.

At about 40-45 years old, our bodies stop producing as much nitric oxide so it’s important to increase supplementation. We specifically created TROOV as a tool for enhancing your body’s nitric oxide pathway. Our TROOVecta blend consists of green tea, fermented beets, and L-Citrulline to synergistically help you perform your very best.

Are the nitrates in this product bad for me?

No! We get that elemental nitrates have a bad rap (and they should) but the nitrates we use are completely different. Ours are derived from nature and are crucial to optimizing your health. These nitrates give you more energy and increase your cardiovascular performance. Want to learn more about the difference? Check out this study:
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5463976/

settings.title: How does TROOV support the nitric oxide pathway?
settings.body:
Honestly, every single part of TROOV was created in consideration of the nitric oxide pathway. Our TROOVecta blend is probably where this shines the most as it consists of green tea, fermented beetroot, and L-Citrulline. These three ingredients work synergistically to give you energy (green tea), expand your blood vessels (beetroot), and supports overall efficiency and performance (L-Citrulline).

Links to learn more:
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5463976/
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26900386/
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27634207/
https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fphys.2018.01137/full

I am a retailer and I want to carry TROOV! How do I go about that?
settings.body: Please contact maxx@drinkTROOV.com

settings.title: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.body: To make it easy, we accept all major credit cards and each order is billed immediately after it ships.

settings.title: How long does it take to process a refund?
settings.body: About 3-5 business days, but the exact date it’ll land in your account depends on your bank.

settings.title: Is my payment information safe?
settings.body: Absolutely. We never store or sell your payment or personal information. We’d prefer to keep that between us.

settings.title: How do I change/modify/cancel my subscription?
settings.body: We’ve got you covered. Just contact us at support@drinkTROOV.com

settings.title: PAYMENT
How do you ship TROOV and what is the cost?
settings.body: We ship TROOV via UPS Ground. Exact shipping costs vary by state, but if you are curious, we can help you figure it out exactly.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.body: Soon! We aren’t international yet, but we’re working on it.

settings.title: I received a notice that my package has arrived but it’s not here yet. What should I do?
settings.body: We get it and we’re here to help you track it down. Our shipping partner, UPS, requires that we wait 48 hours after a delivery notification to file a claim. Keep an eye out, though, because some packages are marked as delivered even though they’re still on their way. After 48 hours, please get in touch at support@drinkTROOV.com so we can help you get it all squared away.
